overview:
Gaurav is a seasoned product executive with a passion for identifying and growing businesses around emerging technologies and markets. Over 15 years experience building products in consumer internet, mobile and social domains.

Gaurav is currently the VP of Product Management at Electronic Arts for the social and mobile label. Prior to EA, Gaurav was an early team member and Director of product at Zynga, leading central product management for their growing portfolio of mobile games (Poker, Words With Friends, Dream Zoo, Draw Something..).

Gaurav is an entrepreneurial leader and founding team member of SMS GupShup ($37M by Charles River Ventures, Globespan) and Elance ($50M by Kleiner Perkins & others).
